hero.title: IT Solutions for Your Business
hero.subtitle: Web Development, Analytics, and Online Marketing

home_seo.title: Web Development and Advertising in Slovakia | White Eagles & Co.
home_seo.description: Professional web development, data analytics, and online marketing in Slovakia. Custom websites, bug fixing, and PPC campaigns to grow your business.
home_seo.keywords: web development, website creation, online marketing, PPC, Google Ads, analytics, GA4, telegram bots, IT solutions, Bratislava, Slovakia

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.desc: Sites from scratch (PHP, Python, JS) or WordPress.
details_points: Definition of business goals and objectives
Competitor analysis for successful blocks and services. Determination of references.
Development and proposal of unique services and tools.
Creation of a multi-page multilingual website with a control panel, application and feedback forms.
Making edits and improvements upon agreement with the customer.

Creation and connection of a Telegram bot for operational management of requests (confirmation / cancellation of booking), making changes to the calendar and slots, as well as managing email notifications to clients.
Connection of domain / hosting (server) / email sending tool / bot protection and Captcha.
Creation of a mandatory banner for obtaining consent to process cookies.
Full SEO setup for ideal indexing in Google and high positions in organic search. Debugging sharing in social networks.
Creation of accounts and connection of resources: Google Tag Manager, Google Console, GA4, Microsoft Clarity, Bing console.
webdev.guarantee: I provide a guarantee of performance and free technical support for 6 months as a gift for all my customers.

bugfix.title: Bugfix & Features
bugfix.desc: Bug fixing on custom sites (code) and WordPress.
bugfix.details: Troubleshooting, optimization, and adding new functionality.
details_points: Problem localization and finding solutions with minimal system risks
Installation of additional tools and plugins
Server-side configuration
Website media content management
Setting up automatic website backups on server + Google Drive
Conducting tests and fixing minor issues related to the main problem

ads.title: Advertising Campaigns
ads.desc: Creation and optimization of Google Ads and Meta campaigns
ads.internal_desc: Creation, management, and optimization of advertising campaigns in Google Ads and Meta (Instagram, Facebook, Threads, WhatsApp)
details_points: Creation of advertising accounts and cabinets
Linking company resources (Analytics, CRM)
Creation of Merchant Center (for e-commerce and online stores)
Creation, moderation, and filling of the company card on Google Maps
Analysis of competitors and their advertising activity
Determination and approval of the advertising budget (broken down by channel) based on clear mathematical calculation.
Development of a unique advertising strategy for a specific product/service and company within its market niche.
Creation of ads and configuration within cabinets
Identity, creation, design, and packaging of turnkey advertising accounts
Setup and launch of Google Ads / Meta Ads campaigns
Integration of analytics systems
Optimization and scaling of advertising campaigns

analytics.title: Web Analytics
analytics.desc: Implementation of server-side GTM, Google Analytics 4, Clarity, Yandex Metrica for precise tracking
analytics.details: Implementation of server-side GTM, Google Analytics 4, Clarity, Yandex Metrica for precise tracking of each visitor's actions
details_points: Connection and setup of Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Server-Side Tracking for GA4
Setup of goals and events
Integration with CRM and advertising accounts
Setup of Clarity / Yandex Metrica
analytics.guarantee: I provide a guarantee of performance and free technical support for 6 months as a gift for all my customers.

cookies.title: Cookie Consent Mode V2
cookies.desc: Adding the mandatory cookie banner required by Google
cookies.internal_desc: Adding the mandatory cookie banner required by Google without a monthly subscription (unlike ready-made modules for integration into custom site code and WordPress plugins)
cookies.details: Adding the mandatory cookie banner required by Google without a monthly subscription (unlike ready-made modules for integration into custom site code and WordPress plugins)
details_points: Creation and configuration of a unique custom cookie consent banner that allows always processing data of all visitors for correct operation of analytical and advertising systems.
Integration into the website code, setting up corporate style and banner colors.
Debugging and performance verification. Testing for 15+ possible cases.

telegram.title: Python Bot Development
telegram.desc: Bots for managing inquiries, auto-posting ads (bazoš), and brand feedback
telegram.internal_desc: Creating custom Python bots for inquiry management, routine process automation, and brand feedback
telegram.details: Creating custom Python bots for inquiry management, routine process automation, and brand feedback
details_points: Bots for mass auto-posting of ads (bazos)
Creating bots for mailing lists based on contact databases
Feedback and inquiry management bots
Bots for managing slots in the website reservation system
Bots for parsing competitor data/followers to create targeting audiences
Other bots for brand popularization and complicating life for competitors
telegram.guarantee: I provide a guarantee of performance and free technical support for 6 months as a gift for all my customers.

biliardovna.desc: Website for a billiard club in Bratislava.

studiokrasy.desc: Multi-page website with a booking system.

topsklad.desc: Multifunctional website with a warehouse booking system.

bodabo.desc: Website for wholesale of vanilla, coffee, and cocoa beans.

about.title: Web Development and Advertising for Business in Slovakia
about.years_sk: I have been living in Slovakia for over 6 years and have thoroughly studied the local market and its specifics.
about.knowledge: I know exactly what digital product to create and how to promote it for the maximum success of your business.
about.pride_title: Great Result without detailed Technical Specifications
about.pride_desc: Experience working with freelancers on the business side allowed me to identify the main pain point of cooperation: a large amount of time spent by company management writing a detailed technical specification to describe all business processes and expectations from the site. I never require a complex Technical Specification from the client and will propose the best solution for approval myself.
about.cta_text: Order a free consultation to discuss the project and receive a personal offer.

steps.title: Stages of Project Cooperation
steps.request_desc: Leave a request <1>via the form</1> and I will contact you as soon as possible.
steps.meeting_desc: We will meet in Bratislava / online to discuss project details and your expectations.
steps.process_desc: Execution of work with approval and periodic reports.
steps.delivery_desc: Acceptance, approval, implementation of revisions, and payment for work.
steps.success_stat: I completed 90% of complex projects within 15 working days

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.controller_text: The data controller is White Eagles & Co. s.r.o., Kukučínova 12, 900 31 Stupava.
privacy.data_collection_text: We collect data through analytics tools to improve our services:
privacy.purpose_text: We use your data to analyze website traffic, improve user experience, and manage our marketing campaigns.
privacy.advertising_text: We use advertising platforms to reach potential customers:
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at welcome@whiteeagles.sk.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Information about how we use cookies.
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience.
cookies.what_are_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.usage_text: We use cookies for analytics and marketing purposes:
cookies.ga4_desc: Used to distinguish users and analyze website traffic.
cookies.meta_desc: Used to track conversions from Facebook and Instagram ads.
cookies.clarity_desc: Used to analyze user behavior on the site (heatmaps, recordings).
cookies.management_text: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
